id.description: The unique ID of the subscription.

users_id.description: The ID of the user who created the subscription.

plan_id.description: The plan name or type for the subscription.

subscription_status_id.description: The status of the subscription (e.g., pending, active, canceled).

created_at.description: The creation date and time of the subscription in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The last update date and time of the subscription in ISO 8601 format.
